thread.title: Peek behind bars: Inmate art show depicts life on death row
thread.title_full: Peek behind bars: Inmate art show depicts life on death row

title: Peek behind bars: Inmate art show depicts life on death row
text: > Pennsylvania Peek behind bars: Inmate art show depicts life on death row Cartoonist Patrick Chappatte, who with his wife, Swiss broadcast journalist Anne-Frederique Widmann, not shown, poses with art from the University of Southern California exhibit "Windows on Death Row: Art From Inside and Outside the Prison Walls," as the exhibition prepares for its opening at the USC Annenberg School for Communication and Journalism in Los Angeles Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015. Featuring dozens of pieces from more than 20 artists in styles that range from oil on canvas to pencil on paper, the show seeks to depict the lives, thoughts and emotions of those incarcerated on death row. The show opens Friday, Oct. 23.(AP Photo/John Rogers)
